column4: Intel mastermind  Silicon Valley statesman Andy Grove dead at 79
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Andy Grove  the Silicon Valley elder statesman who made Intel into the world's top chipmaker and helped usher in the personal computer age  died on Tuesday at age 79  Intel said.

column4: UPDATE 1-Intel mastermind  Silicon Valley statesman Andy Grove dead at 79
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  March 21 Andy Grove  the Silicon Valley elder statesman who made Intel into the world's top chipmaker and helped usher in the personal computer age  died on Tuesday at age 79  Intel said.

column4: Former Intel CEO Chairman Andrew Grove dies at 79 -Intel
column5: March 21 Former Intel Chief Executive Officer and Chairman Andrew Grove died on Monday at age 79  the technology company said in a statement.     (Reporting by Sandra Maler in Washington; Editing by Peter Cooney)
